adjective.definition: Not showing or feeling nervousness, anger, or other strong emotions.
adjective.example: She has a very calm manner.

noun.definition: The state of being free from agitation; tranquility.
noun.example: The bay was a picture of calm.

verb.definition: Make (someone or something) tranquil and quiet; soothe.
verb.example: I tried to calm him down.

usage_examples: You must try to stay calm.
He tried to calm the frightened children.
